articles.title: What oddsmakers are projecting for Patriots, Drake Maye on eve of 2025 season
articles.description:
The Patriots' projected win total is higher than it's been in recent years entering the season.

The post What oddsmakers are projecting for Patriots, Drake Maye on eve of 2025 season appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots' projected win total for 2025 season is notably higher than previous years.
Drake Maye is a key player influencing the team's betting odds this season.
Increased optimism may boost local fan engagement and attendance at games.

articles.title: Brian Hoyer, David Andrews know what fans want as they seek a niche among ex-Patriots in the media
articles.description:
The journeyman quarterback and longtime Patriots center have no reluctance to share their thoughts on 'The Quick Snap,' which now airs on NBC Sports Boston.

The post Brian Hoyer, David Andrews know what fans want as they seek a niche among ex-Patriots in the media appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Brian Hoyer and David Andrews host 'The Quick Snap' on NBC Sports Boston.
The show aims to connect with Patriots fans by sharing insider perspectives.
Local viewers gain access to unique insights from former Patriots players.
